boat.full_description: Early Bill Baily built Lune whammel, small gaff rig with the boat as is, needs larger lugsail ,gunter or gaff mainsail, currently looking for more suitable sails, Douglas fir 16 feet heavy mast, short gaff & boom to fit the small red sails, long shallow keel 19 inches aft, painted GRP hull, foredeck with washboards, bow sprit ,  undergoing a repaint inside & outside, sound hull, ply floor boards, large barn door style rudder with wooden tiller, outboard well, French  braked trailer that cost £3000 in October 2022 purchased in the UK. Price for boat & trailer as is £2250 ono. Can deliver in UK for fuel & expenses.Tel:01556-660007 or 07399552192 email:dhart503@btinternet.com
boat.name: No name
